characters: Driver of a white van, scooter rider
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection. A scooter rider is seen crossing from the left side of the frame. The scooter rider collides with a white van, causing the scooter to fall onto the road. The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and distance from the incident.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and distance from the incident, ensuring safety and avoiding sudden maneuvers.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A scooter rider, approximately 5 meters away, crossing the intersection and colliding with a white van. 2) Front: A white van, approximately 10 meters away, involved in the collision with the scooter.
